reviewtext: This is a fine nylon camera bag.  It fits the Fuji HS10 (and HS20) just right, with a small amount of looseness.  The pocket in front has room for all the extras.  The HS10/HS20 is bigger than the S2000, S1500, and S1800 cameras, and so needs a slightly bigger bag. This bag also comes with a belt loop.
summary: Great fit for Fuji HS10 and HS20
